column4: hey guys, i'm looking for suggestions on an FTP server that i can have running in under 3 minutes, need anonymous read access, don't care much about permissions since it's on a trusted network
i'd sugguest PureFTPD
or...
vsftpd
ProFTPD is probably going to be your "quickest" bet,.
that's what i went with
i don't need more auth options
i need "make server start now"
ProFTPD?
you need to start the service is what you're saying
OR you need a FTPd you can have up and running QUICK.
i need an ftp service i can have running quickly
i don't need it to be running tomororw
are you using ubuntu?
If so, use proftpd.
k, i did
The user accounts on the Ubuntu box are the logins for the FTPd.
like, if you have your account set up as insta , your username and pass is what you log into ubuntu with.
thanks, it's up and running
Sure thing insta, make sure you disable anonymous in /etc/proftpd/proftpd.conf or wherever it may lie.
like i said, i dont' care about that, the ftp server is going to be running over firewire for just long enough to pull 5gb of packages off of it
